info.name: Hermitage Ottoman
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
The Hermitage is pure luxury in leather. This modern twist on the traditional smart and tailored club sofa boasts superb details and high-quality materials, which are combined to create a striking piece of furniture.
There’s a warm rustic beauty about the Hermitage range, due to the saddle-worn look of the top quality and natural grain Italian leather upholstery. The leather is complemented by beautiful finishing details, such as piping along the edges of cushions and slender track arms as well as hand-applied antique studs along the kickboard base. Comfort is guaranteed in plump cushioning and webbed suspension.
 
“This smart, stylish masculine sofa will suit many decorating styles but excels in a traditional environment,” Freedom sofa buyer.
info.description:
Shown in Scottsdale Leather in Tobacco.

OVERVIEW
The Hermitage is pure luxury in leather. This modern twist on the traditional smart and tailored club sofa boasts superb details and high-quality materials, which are combined to create a striking piece of furniture.

There’s a warm rustic beauty about the Hermitage range, due to the saddle-worn look of the top quality and natural grain Italian leather upholstery. The leather is complemented by beautiful finishing details, such as piping along the edges of cushions and slender track arms as well as hand-applied antique studs along the kickboard base. Comfort is guaranteed in plump cushioning and webbed suspension.
 
“This smart, stylish masculine sofa will suit many decorating styles but excels in a traditional environment,” Freedom sofa buyer.
